title: Microservices architecture
description: Exploring the trend towards building applications as a collection of small, loosely coupled services that communicate over the network.

title: Serverless computing
description: Understanding the shift towards cloud providers managing the infrastructure and automatically scaling based on demand, allowing developers to focus on code.
recommended_resources: Serverless Architectures on AWS by Peter Sbarski

title: Containerization with Docker
description: Learning about containerization technology that enables developers to package applications and dependencies into a single unit for easy deployment and scalability.
recommended_resources: Docker Deep Dive by Nigel Poulton

title: Event-driven architecture
description: Exploring the paradigm where decoupled services communicate with each other by reacting to events, enabling scalable and flexible systems.
recommended_resources: Designing Event-Driven Systems by Ben Stopford

title: GraphQL for APIs
description: Discovering the query language for APIs that allows clients to request only the data they need, leading to efficient and flexible backend development.
recommended_resources: Learning GraphQL by Eve Porcello and Alex Banks
